  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_365</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_365</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Aplicaciones de las derivadas</string>
            <string language="en">Applications of the derivative</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anwendungen der Ableitung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Applications du dérivé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aplicações do derivative</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Applicazioni del derivato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εφαρμογές του παραγώγου</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones algunas aplicaciones de la derivada. Se estudia la manera de utilizar la derivada para analizar el crecimiento y decrecimiento de una función, calcular sus máximos y mínimos, optimizar una función para aplicarlo a problemas.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to show some of the applications of derivatives. It studies how to use derivatives to analyse the monotonicity of a function, to calculate its maxima and minima and to find the extreme values of a function in order to apply this knowledge to problems.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">mínimo</string>
            <string language="en">minimum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">optimización</string>
            <string language="en">optimization</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">derivada</string>
            <string language="en">derivative</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">máximo</string>
            <string language="en">maximum</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, einige der Anwendungen der Ableitungen zu zeigen. 
Sie studiert, wie man Ableitungen, um das monotonicity einer 
Funktion zu analysieren, seine Maxima und Minimum zu errechnen benutzt
und die extremen Werte einer Funktion zu finden, um dieses Wissen an 
den Problemen anzuwenden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations de montrer certaines des applications des dérivés. 
Elle étudie comment employer des dérivés pour analyser le 
monotonicity d'une fonction, pour calculer ses maximum et minimum et 
pour trouver les valeurs extrêmes d'une fonction afin de s'appliquer 
cette connaissance aux problèmes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações mostrar 
algumas das aplicações dos derivatives. Estuda como usar 
derivatives analisar o monotonicity de uma função, calcular seus 
máximos e mínimos e encontrar os valores extremos de uma função a 
fim aplicar este conhecimento aos problemas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni mostrare 
alcune delle applicazioni dei derivati. Studia come usare i 
derivati per analizzare il monotonicity di una funzione, per calcolare
i relativi massimi e minimi e per trovare i valori estremi di una 
funzione per applicare questa conoscenza ai problemi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εμφανίσει μερικών από τις εφαρμογές των παραγώγων. 
Μελετά πώς να χρησιμοποιήσει τα παράγωγα για να αναλύσει το
monotonicity μιας λειτουργίας, για να υπολογίσει τα μέγιστα και 
τα ελάχιστά του και για να βρεί τις ακραίες τιμές μιας 
λειτουργίας προκειμένου να εφαρμοστεί αυτή η γνώση στα 
προβλήματα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Minimum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optimierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ableitung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
